description: Bundle the edges of a graph layout. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://www.graphviz.org/pdf/mingle.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Bundle the edges of one or more graph layouts (that already have layout information):
Perform layout, bundling, and output to a picture with one command:
